Data: Since work with imec, there is likely valorization potential and/or an agreement on intellectual property; please describe these, are you allowed to share your data? 
Metadata: you answer no to the question whether you use metadata but under storage you describe the storage of metadata, please clarify. 
Sharing: Will you share data or code underlying your thesis or journal publications; or is IP a factor restricting sharing? If you can make data available for reuse, eg when requested by a journal, you can consider using a repository; e.g. KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr). In RDR your dataset will get a persistent identifier (DOI) that you can refer to in your publication, and your dataset is registered in Lirias so it appears on your publication list. See also https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
